document.full_text: british chip designer arm holdings plc, which licenses its chip technology to other makers, will take any plan by intel corp to make chips for rivals "very seriously," a top executive said on monday.
document.title: arm to "take seriously" any intel plan to make chips for rivals
lines_and_colors: british chip designer arm holdings plc, which licenses its chip technology to other makers, will take any plan by intel corp to make chips for rivals "very seriously," a top executive said on monday.
